reapack.name: HackeyPatterns_exec.lua
reapack.desc: Hackey-Patterns: An interface plugin for REAPER 5.x and up designed to mimick the sequencer in Jeskola Buzz.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Started work on add pattern functionality. Still have to make sure that when patterns are deleted, the media item adjacent is also stretched to fill up the space.
